programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy decides to do something with her life by signing up for a comedy spot at the Comedy Barrel, but Sophia is unimpressed; Blanche is having tax problems, but decides it's nothing that a negligee won't put right.

programme.desc: Dorothy's beau gives up a lucrative legal practice to become a circus clown.

programme.desc: Rose feels insecure about her romance with a college professor.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba advises Van to treat Cheyenne as an equal in the family budget, which prompts him to give her an allowance.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: In an effort to save Brock and Barbra Jean from losing their home, Reba and Van buy their house and rent it out to them.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: After the family makes fun of Reba's poor eyesight, she secretly gets laser eye surgery, which leaves her temporarily blind.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Brock must attend an anger management therapy session that was mandated by the court during their divorce.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles tells Maris that it's divorce or therapy for the couple; Frasier is uncomfortable with touching.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles asks Frasier for advice about his relationship with Maris.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Realizing that everyone else has a companion, Frasier pursues a mysterious caller with a wrong number.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: In Mexico, falls for a stunning model (Sela Ward), who insists he keep their romance a secret.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam tries to get Rebecca her job back after she is fired as manager and he is hired to replace her.

programme.desc: Sam vows a year of celibacy if he is not the father of an ex-girlfriend's baby.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: A physical reveals that Reba has high blood pressure; Van asks for Brock's advice on anniversary gifts.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean overwhelm Cheyenne with advice when she plans her second wedding to Van; Cheyenne tries to call off the wedding.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is rushed to the hospital after collapsing at Van and Cheyenne's non-wedding; Van and Cheyenne question their marriage.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean shows off her new sleek figure and staunch dedication to the gym, which Brock fears is about spending time with her male trainer.

programme.title: In My Dreams
programme.desc: After meeting only in their dreams, a man (Mike Vogel) and a woman (Katharine McPhee) have seven days to turn their romantic visions into reality.

programme.title: Love, Fall & Order
programme.desc: A woman heads back to her hometown on a mission to help save her father's annual Fall Fest, which is held on her family's pumpkin farm.

programme.title: Blind Date Book Club
programme.desc: A bookstore owner finds love and direction in her life when she agrees to review a famous author's new novel.

programme.title: The Secret Ingredient
programme.desc: A small-town baker reunites with her ex-fiance after traveling to New York City to compete on a Valentine's Day cooking show.

programme.title: Hearts in the Game
programme.desc: Top New York City publicist Hazel Miller is tasked with spinning the image of MLB pitcher Diego Vasquez, who froze during Game 7 of the World Series. He also happens to be the guy who broke her heart in high school.

programme.title: An Easter Bloom
programme.desc: A young gardener enters an Easter floral competition to save her family farm. Along the way, she meets a local pastor who helps restore her lost hope.

programme.title: Journey to You
programme.desc: After missing out on a promotion, Monica reluctantly walks the Camino de Santiago at the urging of her mother. She's surprised when along the way, she finds inner peace and an unexpected romance.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Josh's Third Serving
programme.desc: When after school programs see their funding cut, teachers Josh and Ella turn to fundraising before banding together in search of a larger donation, falling hard along the way.

programme.desc: Dorothy sends her unemployed son to live with his equally irresponsible father.

programme.desc: Blanche renews hostilities with her sister when she travels home to attend her father's funeral.
